alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 19 at 11:44AM PST until November 19 at 4:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, northeast winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts to 75 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory, northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 55 mph. * WHERE...San Bernardino County Mountains. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 6 PM this evening to 10 AM PST Tuesday. For the Wind Advisory, until 4 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Strong winds could damage trees and other objects. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS....Strongest winds along the south-facing slopes.
info.instruction: Use caution if you must drive.
